entities.description: "Israel is a country in the Middle East that has been conducting airstrikes and is planning a ground invasion in Gaza."
"Gaza is a Palestinian territory where hospitals are overwhelmed with injured people and is facing an evacuation order from Israel."
"Dr. Muhammad Abu Salima is the director of Gaza City’s Al Shifa Hospital, expressing the impossibility of evacuating the hospital."
"Al Shifa Hospital is the largest medical complex in Gaza, struggling with the influx of injured patients and the evacuation order."
"Hamas is the group that controls Gaza and which Israel is responding to with airstrikes following an attack that killed over 1,300 people."
"The United States is involved in diplomatic talks to ease the humanitarian crisis in Gaza and is deploying an aircraft carrier to the eastern Mediterranean."
"Egypt is involved in diplomatic talks to ease the humanitarian crisis in Gaza and has trucks of aid idling at the border."
"The Oct. 7 attack by Hamas, which controls Gaza, killed more than 1,300 people and prompted Israel's response with airstrikes."
"The anticipated Israeli ground invasion of Gaza has led to an evacuation order for hospitals and over a million Palestinians in northern Gaza."
"Jerusalem is the location where the article is based, detailing the situation in Gaza and the surrounding geopolitical context."
"RAJA ABDULRAHIM is the author of the article, providing a firsthand account of the events unfolding in Gaza and the diplomatic efforts to address the crisis."
"Thomas Fuller is one of the co-authors of the article, contributing to the coverage of the humanitarian crisis in Gaza."
"Aaron Boxerman is one of the co-authors of the article, involved in reporting on the situation in Gaza and the international response."
"The White House, represented by national security adviser Jake Sullivan, is involved in diplomatic efforts to address the crisis in Gaza, including restoring water to a pipeline."
"Jake Sullivan, the White House national security adviser, announced that Israel agreed to restore water to a pipeline serving a part of Gaza."
"Benjamin Netanyahu, the Prime Minister of Israel, stated that Israel will take Hamas apart during a meeting of Israel’s new emergency wartime government."
"Palestinians are the inhabitants of Gaza, significantly affected by the conflict, with many injured and displaced due to the airstrikes and the evacuation order."
"The American Museum of Natural History is planning to overhaul its stewardship of human remains, addressing the legacy of its collecting practices and improving storage and study of the remains."
"Sean M. Decatur, the president of the American Museum of Natural History, emphasized the importance of understanding and describing the museum's collection of human remains."
"ZACHARY SMALL is the author of the article discussing the American Museum of Natural History's plans to overhaul its stewardship of human remains."
